name: OR_LNLG_DRESSING_NEEDED
description: This table contains information about whether or not a dressing is needed.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DRESSING_NEEDED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether or not dressing is needed.
